com.lukeleber.scandroid.sae.j1979

Class AbstractServiceFacet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukeleber.scandroid.sae.j1979.AbstractServiceFacet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable, ServiceFacet, Internationalized, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ServiceFacet>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractPID

    public abstract class AbstractServiceFacet
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServiceFacet
    A partial, skeletal implementation of the ServiceFacet interface that provides access to the basic immutable members.
    See Also:
    ServiceFacet, Serializable, Parcelable, Internationalized, Serialized Form

      • getDisplayName

        public final java.lang.String getDisplayName()
        Retrieves the ISO/SAE/Manufacturer specified display name of this ServiceFacet. It can be assumed that this string may be displayed to the user in a GUI. There exists an option to retrieve a more user-friendly version of the display name through the use of Internationalized.toI18NString(android.content.Context).
        Specified by:
        getDisplayName in interface ServiceFacet
        Returns:
        the ISO/SAE/Manufacturer specified display name of this ServiceFacet

      • getDescription

        public final java.lang.String getDescription()

        Retrieves a brief description of this ServiceFacet. Note - descriptions are not explicitly required to be displayed to users, and may not use the wording of the standard in verbatim. This method can be thought of as a non-standard extension of J1979 that can be safely ignored if strict compatibility is required.

        That being said, I felt that the descriptions should be available so that if users want to gain a deeper understanding of onboard diagnostics, the information would be available in a "non-standardese" dialect. "Standardese" is hard enough for implementers to understand sometimes, let alone end-users!

        Specified by:
        getDescription in interface ServiceFacet
        Returns:
        a brief description of this ServiceFacet
